title: Episode 7.5: Live At Kramerbooks In D.C.
dc:creator: Brendan Sweeney
description:
In front of a live audience, we nerd out on questions about ridership and "death spirals;" 
expansion plans and bus lanes; and the 1990s technology we can't seem to
 escape.
